title: Spirit Guard Udyr Emotes Missing
body: In the last few patches I've noticed that the Ultimate skin, Spirit Guard Udyr has been bugged. Normally when you use the different stances they should all have unique taunts, jokes and quotes over all. Lately no matter what stance you're in you only hear bear stance jokes, taunts and quotes.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working to fix it!
I've been posting on PBE about this and lack of Profile banners/summoner icons for about 4 months now lol.
I have seen Red post on the bug forums say that they are aware of that and should be fixed in the next patch.
